preferences.name: wineBinaryPath
preferences.title: Wine Binary Path
preferences.description: Absolute path to the Wine executable (e.g., /usr/bin/wine or /opt/wine-staging/bin/wine). Leave empty to use 'wine' from system PATH if Exec line uses it, or to use Exec line as is.

preferences.name: additionalDesktopDirs
preferences.title: Additional .desktop Directories
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of extra directories to search for .desktop files.

commands.name: launch-wine-program
commands.title: Launch Wine Program
commands.description: List .desktop files and launch the selected program with Wine.

commands.name: launch-wine-taskbar
commands.title: Start or Stop Wine Virtual Desktop
commands.description: Start a Wine virtual desktop session, or stop it if already running.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
